actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to increase authorizations provided for under the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Public Transportation Stimulus Act of 1979 - Amends the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to authorize additional appropriations of $10,000,000,000 for use through fiscal year 1989 for the urban mass transit discretionary grant program under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to increase authorizations provided for under the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964, and for other purposes.
